original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattaṁ?
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāya sa saggam sādiyana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññatta

original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena kāya sa saggam sādiyana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisa puggalassa kāya sasaggam tasmim vatthusmi
atthi tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppanna paññatti iti
catunnam pātimokkha uddesānam katthogadham kattha pariyāpannanti
sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam katamaḥ āpatti kkhandhaḥ ti
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti iti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe…
analyzed: kāyataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na vācataḥ pe
vajja ppaṭicchādana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī jānaṁ pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpannaṁ bhikkhuniṁ nevattanā paṭicodesi na gaṇassa ārocesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī jānam pārājikam dhammaṃ ajjhāpannam bhikkhunim na iva attanā paṭicodesi na gaṇassa ārocesi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ ariṭṭhaṁ bhikkhuṁ gaddhabādhipubbaṁ anuvatti, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam ariṭṭham bhikkhum gaddha bādhi pubbam anuvatti tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūraṇapaccayā pārājikaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: aṭṭhamam vatthum paripūraṇa paccayā pārājikam kattha paññattanti

original: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo aṭṭhamaṁ vatthuṁ paripūresuṁ, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ aṭṭhamam vatthum paripūresu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṁ karaṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññatto?
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍam karaṇa paccayā saṅgha ādisesaḥ kattha paññatto

original: Yaṁ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍaṁ karaṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: yam tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena ussayavādikāya bhikkhuniyā aḍḍam karaṇa paccayā saṅgha ādisesaḥ kattha paññatto ti

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī ussayavādikā vihari, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī ussaya vādikā vihari tasmiṃ vatthusmi
atthi tattha paññatti anupaññatti anuppanna paññatti iti
catunnam pātimokkha uddesānam katthogadham kattha pariyāpannanti
sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam katamaḥ āpatti kkhandhaḥ ti
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti iti

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na cittataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe…
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe
corim vuṭṭhāpana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī coriṁ vuṭṭhāpesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī corim vuṭṭhāpesi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti

original: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
analyzed: siyā vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti na kāyataḥ

original: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
analyzed: siyā kāyataḥ ca vācataḥ ca cittataḥ ca samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Ekā gāmantaraṁ gamanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: ekā gāmantaram gamana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Aññatarā bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaraṁ gacchi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: aññatarā bhikkhunī ekā gāmantaram gacchi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāraṇapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhunim dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena an apaloketvā kāraka saṅgham an aññāya gaṇassa chandam osāraṇa paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittaṁ bhikkhuniṁ dhammena vinayena satthusāsanena anapaloketvā kārakasaṅghaṁ anaññāya gaṇassa chandaṁ osāresi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: thullanandā bhikkhunī samaggena saṅghena ukkhittam bhikkhunim dhammena vinayena satthu sāsanena an apaloketvā kāraka saṅgham an aññāya gaṇassa chandam osāresi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisa puggalassa hatthato khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisapuggalassa hatthato āmisaṁ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: sundarīnandā bhikkhunī avassutā avassutassa purisa puggalassa hatthataḥ āmisam paṭiggahesi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: “Kiṁ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto vā, yato tvaṁ anavassutā.
analyzed: kim te ayye esaḥ purisa puggalo karissati avassutaḥ vā an avassutaḥ vā yatas tvam an avassutā

original: Iṅgha, ayye, yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā
analyzed: iṅgha ayye yam te esaḥ purisa puggalaḥ deti khādanīyam vā bhojanīyam vā tam tvam sahatthā

original: paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā ti uyyojana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Aññatarā bhikkhunī—“kiṁ te, ayye, eso purisapuggalo karissati avassuto vā anavassuto
analyzed: aññatarā bhikkhunī kim te ayye eso purisa puggalo karissati avassutaḥ vā an avassutaḥ

original: vā, yato tvaṁ anavassutā. Iṅgha, ayye, yaṁ te eso purisapuggalo deti khādanīyaṁ vā
analyzed: vā yatas tvam an avassutā ayye yam te esaḥ purisa puggalaḥ deti khādanīyam vā

original: bhojanīyaṁ vā taṁ tvaṁ sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: bhojanīyam vā tam tvam sahatthā paṭiggahetvā khāda vā bhuñja vā iti uyyojesi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam tīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti pe

original: Kupitāya anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: kupitāya anattamanāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—“buddhaṁ paccācikkhāmi, dhammaṁ paccācikkhāmi, saṅghaṁ paccācikkhāmi, sikkhaṁ paccācikkhāmī”ti, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kupitā anatta manāḥ evam avaca buddham paccācikkhāmi dhammam paccācikkhāmi saṅgham paccācikkhāmi sikkham paccācikkhāmi iti tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: kismiñcid eva adhikaraṇe paccākatāya bhikkhuniyā yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcideva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanā evaṁ avaca—“chandagāminiyo
analyzed: caṇḍakāḷī bhikkhunī kismiñcid eva adhikaraṇe paccākatā kupitā anattamanāḥ evam

original: ca bhikkhuniyo, dosagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, mohagāminiyo ca bhikkhuniyo, bhayagāminiyo
analyzed: ca bhikkhuniyaḥ dosa gāminiyaḥ ca bhikkhuniyaḥ moha gāminiyaḥ ca bhikkhuniyaḥ bhaya gāminiyaḥ
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Saṁsaṭṭhānaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: bhikkhunīnam yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Sambahulā bhikkhuniyo saṁsaṭṭhā vihariṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: sambahulāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ sa saṭṭhāḥ viharisu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: “Saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojentiyā yāvatatiyaṁ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjanapaccayā saṅghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
analyzed: ayye tumhe viharatha mā tumhe nānā viharittha ati uyyojentiyā yāvatatiyam samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjana paccayā saṅgha ādiseso kattha paññatto ti

original: Thullanandā bhikkhunī—“saṁsaṭṭhāva, ayye, tumhe viharatha. Mā tumhe nānā viharitthā”ti uyyojesi, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: thullanandā ayye tumhe viharatha mā tumhe nānā viharittha iti uyyojesi tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhāti

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā pāṭidesanīyaṁ kattha paññattanti?
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjana paccayā pāṭidesanīyam kattha paññattanti

original: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjiṁsu, tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ.
analyzed: chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjisu tasmim vatthusmi
channam āpatti samuṭṭhānānam catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti pe
